A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you enjoy pointless\, plotless movies with gigantic holes\, terrible new characters that make you yearn for Jar Jar Binks\, humorless humor and flawed storytelling you will love this movie.\n\nIf you are looking for a real Star Wars story\, this is not your movie.  Never have I been so disappointed....it's really that bad.  And no\, I'm not a bot...just a very disappointed and angry lifelong fan who witnessed the beloved story of a galaxy far\, far away being completely ruined by the worst minutes I've spent in a theater EVER!!
